trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the confirmation handler of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività utilizzata per richiamare in modo esplicito il gestore della conferma di un <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> che contiene <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> per questa attività <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> che contiene <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> per questa attività <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity explicitly invokes the confirmation handler of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene specificato <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>, l'attività <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> richiama in modo esplicito il gestore della conferma di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>che restituisce <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> activity executes the default confirmation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Quando non è specificato <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>, l'attività <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm> esegue la conferma predefinita per una qualsiasi attività figlio <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> nell'ordine inverso del completamento riuscito.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> viene generato se <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Confirm.Target%2A> si riferisce a un <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> che è stato confermato o compensato precedentemente.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore viene impostato al runtime, viene generato un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
